fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time Player A or Player B visit each other, the next people Players C and D visit will each be dealt a basic attack.
- Whenever Player C visits a player that Player B visited before, the next person Player A visits will deal a powerful attack to whoever the next person they visit visits.
- Each night, the person Player B previously visited will be redirected to Player A. Player A's night target will also be redirected to Player C.
- Players that visit Player D on a full moon night visit Player A, and players that don't visit Player A are redirected to Player D, which counts for them as a visit to Player D which means they visit Player A.
- Players that play as players that are players A, B, C or D visit each other whenever one another visits one of the other players that are players.
- Players A and C will visit the next person they visit in addition to their original target.
- Player D isn't a player on full moons.
